snippet: Masaaki Suzuki offered a period-instrument account of Haydn’s 1798 oratorio, “Die Schöpfung” (“The Creation”), on Monday evening at St. Bartholomew’s Church.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance of Haydn's oratorio Die Schopfung by the Yale Schola Cantorum at St Bartholomew's Church.
lead_paragraph: Masaaki Suzuki offered a period-instrument account of Haydn’s 1798 oratorio, “Die Schöpfung” (“The Creation”), on Monday evening at St. Bartholomew’s Church.

headline.seo: Haydn’s Oratorio ‘Die Schöpfung’ at St. Bartholomew’s Church
headline.main: The Angels in the Heavens Sing for Themselves
headline.print_headline: The Angels in the Heavens Sing for Themselves
